product.title: Unbranded Instawave Deluxe Automatic Rotating Curling Iron, Ceramic Ionic Technology, Tangle Prevention, 2-Way Rotation, Dual Heat Settings up to 420°F, 1” Curling Wand, 2-Year Warranty - Black & White
product.title_excluding_brand: Instawave Deluxe Automatic Rotating Curling Iron, Ceramic Ionic Technology, Tangle Prevention, 2-Way Rotation, Dual Heat Settings up to 420°F, 1” Curling Wand, 2-Year Warranty - Black & White
product.description: Kiss Ceramic Instawave automatic hair curler is the perfect styling tool for those who just can’t style with conventional curling irons and wands. Patented Curl Dial has ridges/prongs that act as combs which smooth and detangle hair as it curls The ceramic ionic technology fosters healthy, shiny salon style curls or waves with less frizz and damage with just a touch of a button Your hands are never near the hot iron so there is no need for a heat resistant glove. Ensure hair is clean, completely dry and combed before using this curling tool Kiss automatic hair curler has two heat settings that can reach up to 420 ° F. It also has an auto shut off after 90 minutes of use. Winner of BeautyMag’s Best Overall Curling Iron for Short Hair 2021.

product.description_full:
Kiss Ceramic Instawave automatic hair curler is the perfect styling tool for those who just can’t style with conventional curling irons and wands. Patented Curl Dial has ridges/prongs that act as combs which smooth and detangle hair as it curls The ceramic ionic technology fosters healthy, shiny salon style curls or waves with less frizz and damage with just a touch of a button Your hands are never near the hot iron so there is no need for a heat resistant glove. Ensure hair is clean, completely dry and combed before using this curling tool Kiss automatic hair curler has two heat settings that can reach up to 420 ° F. It also has an auto shut off after 90 minutes of use. Winner of BeautyMag’s Best Overall Curling Iron for Short Hair 2021. * Kiss Ceramic Instawave automatic hair curler is the perfect styling tool for those who just can’t style with conventional curling irons and wands.
 * Patented Curl Dial has ridges/prongs that act as combs which smooth and detangle hair as it curls
 * The ceramic ionic technology fosters healthy, shiny salon style curls or waves with less frizz and damage with just a touch of a button
 * Your hands are never near the hot iron so there is no need for a heat resistant glove. Ensure hair is clean, completely dry and combed before using this curling tool
 * Kiss automatic hair curler has two heat settings that can reach up to 420 ° F. It also has an auto shut off after 90 minutes of use. Winner of BeautyMag’s Best Overall Curling Iron for Short Hair 2021.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
